column1: Smoque BBQ////I have to say that I have had BBQ in LOTS of places around the US
column2: but this place is DA BOMB!!!!!  The best ribs
column4: and the brisket is A W E S O M E!!!!!!!!  If you like BBQ and you need a place to go
column5: TRY THIS PLACE!!  There is usually a line out the door and parking can be an issue but it is worth the wait!!  YUMMY!!
